phases.name: Phase 1: Construction
phases.description: Water, sewer, active transportation trail, and road upgrades from Haley Road to Railway tracks.

phases.name: Phase 2: Planned
phases.description: Upgrades from Railway tracks to Town boundary (Pending budget approval).

events.name: Tender Awarded
events.description: Phase 1 tender awarded to Dexter Construction.

events.name: Emergency Council Meeting
events.description: Meeting to address resident concerns regarding traffic and delays.

events.name: Final Paving (2025)
events.description: Final day of paving for Phase 1. Base coat completed.

events.name: Substantial Completion (Phase 1)
events.description: Target date for substantial completion of Phase 1.

phases.name: Funding Confirmed
phases.description: Funding confirmed late summer, allowing project to proceed.

phases.name: Phase 1: Construction
phases.description: Sewer lining, asphalt resurfacing, and sidewalks on West/James Streets.

phases.name: Phase 2: Planned
phases.description: Water main upgrades and remaining street work (Pending approval).

events.name: Funding Confirmed
events.description: External funding confirmed, allowing tendering to proceed.

events.name: Work Ongoing
events.description: Crews on-site for West Street improvements.

events.name: Paving Begins
events.description: Final stretch of roadwork paving begins.

events.name: Base Paving Complete
events.description: Base coat completed. Sewer work paused for holidays.

events.name: Sewer Lining Completion
events.description: Expected completion of sewer lining work.
